channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 51 – Koh Phangan
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I think I might try the shopping and the palace (I assume you mean the Grand Palace.) We'll see how that goes :)
item.content:encoded: I think I might try the shopping and the palace (I assume you mean the Grand Palace.) We’ll see how that goes :)

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Go to King's palace if you have time, it's really nice. For shopping i think MBK is the usual place. If you're going to http://www.siamoceanworld.co.th/ i have an non-important order for you :)
item.content:encoded: Go to King’s palace if you have time, it’s really nice. For shopping i think MBK is the usual place. If you’re going to http://www.siamoceanworld.co.th/ i have an non-important order for you :)
